attributes.action: Add public transport workers & frontline keyworkers to the vaccine priority list
attributes.additional_details:
The government has set out a 9 point priority list for the vaccination roll out.

Bus drivers, train guards, and other frontline keyworkers should be added towards the top of this list
attributes.background: Frontline public transport workers, such as bus drivers, and train guards for example, should be prioritised for the vaccine as the volume of people they come into contact with, and the enclosed nature of the vehicles they are in puts them at a greater risk of catching and spreading Covid19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564819
